definition: a hole through which buttons are pushed, to detain in conversation by or as if by holding on to the outer garments of
details:
noun
- a hole through which buttons are pushed
= synonyms: button hole
verb
- to detain in conversation by or as if by holding on to the outer garments of
= example: to detain in conversation by or as if by holding on to the outer garments of
= synonyms: lobby
